description:
A junior high school homeroom music teacher that works at the school Ran and Shin`ichi attended. She always scolded Shin`ichi for his tone deafness, which he calls `terrorizing`.
Sayuri has a weakness for lemon tea. She`s also the daughter of http://anidb.net/ch8188 [Matsumoto Kiyonaga].
name: Matsumoto Sayuri
